survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights into user preferences and satisfaction levels with various streaming service content offerings, to help improve content recommendations and platform features.

questions.question_text: Which streaming services do you currently subscribe to? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unlisted services.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which streaming services do you currently subscribe to? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On average, how many hours do you spend streaming content per week?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button scale for clarity.

script.question_text: On average, how many hours do you spend streaming content per week?

questions.question_text: What type of content do you primarily watch on streaming services? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of content do you primarily watch on streaming services? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of content available on your primary streaming service?
questions.routing_logic: Ask if Q1 has at least one selection.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of content available on your primary streaming service?
script.routing_logic: Ask if Q1 has at least one selection.

questions.question_text: What is the most important factor when choosing a streaming service?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the most important factor when choosing a streaming service?

questions.question_text: How often do you discover new content through the platform's recommendations?
questions.routing_logic: Ask if Q1 has at least one selection.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you discover new content through the platform's recommendations?
script.routing_logic: Ask if Q1 has at least one selection.

questions.question_text: Which device do you primarily use for streaming?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional devices.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which device do you primarily use for streaming?

questions.question_text: Do you use any parental control features on your streaming service?
questions.routing_logic: Ask if Q1 has at least one selection.
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no radio button.

script.question_text: Do you use any parental control features on your streaming service?
script.routing_logic: Ask if Q1 has at least one selection.

questions.question_text: What additional features would encourage you to use a streaming service more often? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What additional features would encourage you to use a streaming service more often? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions about your streaming experience.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure text box is mobile-friendly.
